title: Stanisławów, Częstochowa County
text:
Stanisławów is a <a href="village">village</a> in the administrative district of <a href="Gmina%20Przyr%C3%B3w">Gmina Przyrów</a>, in <a href="Cz%C4%99stochowa%20County">Częstochowa County</a>, <a href="Silesian%20Voivodeship">Silesian Voivodeship</a>, in southern Poland. It lies approximately south-east of <a href="Przyr%C3%B3w">Przyrów</a>, east of <a href="Cz%C4%99stochowa">Częstochowa</a>, and north-east of the regional capital <a href="Katowice">Katowice</a>.
The village has a population of 93.
References.
